name: Sandbox (Frozen Vortex Games)
description:
Welcome to the beginning of Sandbox. Sandbox is a multiplayer FPS game currently in development by Frozen Vortex Games. Sandbox is not like any other FPS, and although it may not be noticeable now, in the future this game should be very different.

Please send any feedback/suggestions to "Brannydonowt" on Skype. Or contact us via email - Frozenvortexgames@hotmail.com

We appreciate the time that you put into playing Sandbox, and I hope that you enjoy the game!
